unnormalised: Arre, havamaan ahavalaan 15/08-ak zhor dhaddak pavs poddtolo mhunta! Aasha kortaan India Gate-ar svatantr disacho karyakram dhuvun vochonakaa. Met Dept 32°C astolo mhonn sangtaa, mhunnun udak piyevn tonni thond dovraa bhav!
normalised: Arre, havamaan ahaval sangta 15/08 yer khub paus poddtolo! Asha asa India Gate-cher svatantratai disacho karyakram panyant vochonk na. Havamaan khatem 32°C sangta, dekhun udok piyevn tan lagoon di naka bhav!
